nl.inl.util

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.util.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Misc. utilities that haven't yet found a place in InlJavaLib. TODO: move to InlJavaLib (deprecate/remove here)

    • Method Detail

      • removeBlackLabTestDirs

        public static void removeBlackLabTestDirs()
        Removes temporary test directories that may be left over from previous test runs because of memory mapping file locking on Windows. It is good practice to start and end a test run by calling removeBlackLabTestDirs().

      • createBlackLabTestDir

        public static java.io.File createBlackLabTestDir(java.lang.String name)
        Create a temporary directory for BlackLab testing. A GUID is used to avoid collisions. Note that because of memory mapping and file locking issues, temp dirs may hang around. It is good practice to start and end a test run by calling removeBlackLabTestDirs().
        Parameters:
        name - descriptive name to be used in the temporary dir (useful while debugging)
        Returns:
        the newly created temp dir.

      • getIndexWriterConfig

        public static org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriterConfig getIndexWriterConfig(org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer,
                                                             boolean create)
